name: all-in-one baby top
notes:
this is my most popular baby pattern. it has been made and enjoyed by knitters all over the world. 

a very easy baby top. :) 
knitted all-in-one from the top down - with no sewing up! 
there are instructions for 2 variations of this pattern design ~ a matinee /swing  style top & a sleeveless cardi with ribbing at the neck & lower edge

sizes - small newborn,  0-3 months, 6 months and 9-12 months

requires - dk yarn (light worsted) and 4mm needles


you will find the instructions for bigger sizes ~ age 1-3 years and 4-6 years at ~ 

http://mariannaslazydaisydays.blogspot.co.uk/2014/03/mariannas-all-in-one-sleeveless-tops.html

i have also written a variation with long sleeves


and there is a link to the matching hat - so cute!  

a lovely gift for a newborn baby.


**to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below
